about_the_game:
Welcome to the neon-soaked streets of Neo Vista City, where the allure of the near future meets the grit of urban landscapes. In Interstate Cowboys, embark on an electrifying RPG adventure from the creators of the award-winning Vaudeville, the first AI-driven detective game, that took the gaming world by storm.



Venture into the heart of Neo Vista City as Driver Zero, a fresh face in a city teeming with secrets and danger. Join forces with the dynamic duo of Dexter 'Rex' Sterling and Alex 'Neon' Ramirez as they navigate the treacherous waters of the criminal underworld. Together, take on Viktor 'The Baron' Morozov and his nefarious schemes in a gripping tale of power and betrayal.



Interstate Cowboys combines the immersive storytelling of its predecessor with brand-new RPG and turn-based combat mechanics. Engage in thrilling arcade driving sequences, meticulously plan daring heists, and forge dynamic relationships with AI-generated NPCs. Every choice you make shapes the narrative, leading to multiple branching paths and unforgettable consequences.



With its captivating synthwave aesthetics and advanced narrative development, Interstate Cowboys promises an unforgettable journey through a world where danger lurks around every corner. Are you ready to ride into the sunset as the ultimate Interstate Cowboy?

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes content that deals with mature topics and may not be appropriate for all audiences.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD GCN+, NVIDIA Kepler+, or Intel HD 5000-series or newer
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: This game requires an internet connection to play

short_description: Interstate Cowboys is a role-playing game set in Neo Vista City, a mix of 80s aesthetics and near-future technology. It features dual protagonists with AI-generated NPC dialogues, dynamic relationships, immersive synthwave aesthetics, a blend of RPG elements with arcade driving, and heist planning.
